biblebot.slogan: Scrioptar bho'n d√®iligear Discord agad dhad' chr√¨dhe.
biblebot.commandList:
`/{search}` - rannsaich rannan le faclan-luirg
`/{version}` - roghainnean is fiosrachadh tionndaidhean
`/{language}` - roghainnean is fiosrachaidh c√†nain
`/{formatting}` - roghainnean stoidhlichean rannan is d√≤igh-ghi√πlain a' bhoit
`/{dailyverse}` - rannan l√†itheil agus f√®in-obrachas
`/{random}` - faigh rann B√¨obuill tuaireamach
`/{resource}` - aideachaidhean, ceistneachain, aidmheilean-chreideimh, agus sgr√¨obhanan eachdraidheil
`/{stats}` - faic stadastaigean a' bhoit
`/{invite}` - ceanglaichean cuiridh a' bhoit agus an fhrithealaiche tacais

Faic <https://biblebot.xyz/usage-and-commands> gus barrachd √≤rduighean fhaighinn.

invite.description: See bot and support server invites.
invite.usage:
To invite the bot to your server, click [here](https://biblebot.xyz/invite).
To join the official Discord server, click [here](https://biblebot.xyz/discord).

For information on the permissions we request, click [here](https://biblebot.xyz/permissions/).

announce.description: Announce something to all servers. (owner only)

supporters.title: Patreon Supporters
supporters.listStart: Many thanks to our Patreon supporters

resource.usage:
To use a resource, do `/{resource} {resource}: {name}`.
For example, `/{resource} {resource}: nicene` or `/{resource} {resource}: ccc {range}: 1`.

parameters.resourceDesc: The resource you wish to use.
parameters.rangeDesc: The range of pages/sections you want to view, for example `1` or `1-5`.

formatting.displayStyleStatus: Your preferred display style is set to {displayStyle}.
formatting.serverDisplayStyleStatus: The server's preferred display style is set to {serverDisplayStyle}.
formatting.bracketsStatus: The bot will ignore verses in this server surrounded by {ignoringBrackets}.
formatting.relatedCommands:
**/{setversenumbers}** - enable or disable verse numbers
**/{settitles}** - enable or disable titles
**/{setpagination}** - enable or disable verse pagination
**/{setdisplay}** - set your preferred display style
**/{setserverdisplay}** - set the server's preferred display style (staff only)
**/{setbrackets}** - set the bot's ignoring brackets for this server (staff only)

setserverdisplay.description: Set your server's preferred display style.
setserverdisplay.cta: Select your server's preferred display style.

setbrackets.description: Set the bot's ignoring brackets for this server.
setbrackets.argumentsError: Expected a parameter with two characters, that must be `<>`, `[]`, `{}`, or `()`.
setbrackets.argumentsError2: The brackets can only be set to `<>`, `[]`, `{}`, or `()`.
setbrackets.characterIssue: The brackets can only be two characters.

language.status: Your preferred language is set to {language}.
language.serverStatus: The server's preferred language is set to {serverLanguage}.
language.relatedCommands:
**/{setlanguage}** - set your preferred language
**/{setserverlanguage}** - set the server's default language (staff only)
**/{listlanguages}** - list all available languages

setlanguage.argumentsError: Expected a language parameter, like `{english}` or `{german}`.

parameters.objectNameDesc: The object name of the language.

setserverlanguage.argumentsError: Expected a language parameter, like `{english}` or `{german}`.
setserverlanguage.fail: Failed to set server language, see `/{listlanguages}`.

parameters.objectNameDesc: The object name of the language.

version.status: Your preferred version is set to {version}.
version.serverStatus: The server's preferred version is set to {serverVersion}.
version.relatedCommands:
**/{setversion}** - set your preferred version
**/{setserverversion} - set the server's default version (staff only)
**/{versioninfo}** - get information on a version
**/{listversions}** - list all available versions

setversion.argumentsError: Expected a version abbreviation parameter, like `{RSV}` or `{KJV}`.

setserverversion.argumentsError: Expected a version abbreviation parameter, like `{RSV}` or `{KJV}`.
setserverversion.fail: Failed to set server version, see `/{listversions}`.

versioninfo.argumentsError: Expected a version abbreviation parameter, like `{RSV}` or `{KJV}`.
versioninfo.fail: I couldn't find that version, see `/{listversions}`.

dailyverse.description: Display the verse of the day.

dailyverseset.description: Setup automatic daily verses on this channel.
dailyverseset.fail: Go to https://biblebot.xyz/daily-verse-setup/ to continue the setup process.
dailyverseset.failDM: The automatic daily verse cannot be used in DMs, as DMs do not allow for webhooks.

dailyversestatus.description: See automatic daily verse status for this server.
dailyversestatus.status: The daily verse will be sent at `{time}`, in the **{tz}** time zone, and will be published in {#{channelId}}. It will use this server's preferred version, which you can find by using **`/{version}`**.
dailyversestatus.relatedCommands:
Use **`/{dailyverseset}`** to set a new time or channel.
Use **`/{dailyverseclear}`** to clear automatic daily verse settings.
dailyversestatus.fail: The automatic daily verse has not been setup for this server or has been configured incorrectly. Use `/{dailyverseset}` to setup the automatic daily verse.

dailyverseclear.description: Clear all automatic daily verse preferences for this server.
dailyverseclear.success: Cleared all daily verse webhooks successfully.

random.description: Display a random verse from a predetermined pool.
random.bibliomancyWarning: This command should not be used for bibliomancy - do not ascribe spiritual value to computer-generated randomness.
random.useInDMs: This server has personally requested that this command be only used in DMs to avoid spam.

truerandom.description: Display a random verse based on random number generation.
truerandom.bibliomancyWarning: This command should not be used for bibliomancy - do not ascribe spiritual value to computer-generated randomness.
truerandom.useInDMs: This server has personally requested that this command be only used in DMs to avoid spam.

search.queryTooShort: Your search query needs to be at least 4 characters.
search.noResults: Your search query produced no results.
